DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy Vitamin D3 B.O.N . Intramuscular Injection within 12 week placebo adult Vitamin D Deficiency .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective , Multi-center Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Vitamin D3 B.O.N . Intramuscular Injection Adults With Vitamin D Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Subjects vitamin D deficiency Subjects experience hypersensitivity cholecalciferol Subjects renal impairment Subjects Hypercalcemia Subjects Hypercalciuria Subjects clinically doubt calcium stone Subjects diagnose sarcoidosis Subjected diagnose pseudohypoparathyroidism Subjected malignancy Subjects clinically significant cardiovascular lung impairment Judged investigator Subjects laboratory abnormality ( Platelet , WBC , Absolute neutrophil count , Albumin , AST ALT ) Subjects take vitamin D supplement study period
